text: You should google reels - they basically make the environments for shots. So they would create beautiful stills that would project into the back of a shot... set extend or create a set from scratch. <https://vimeo.com/259317189> (google DMP reels)

attachments.title: ATOMIC DMP REEL 2017
attachments.text: This is our reel with Digital Matte Paintings created by our photogrammetry and compositing department. It includes backgrounds that were created in 3D, 2D and 2.5D
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/259317189?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" title="ATOMIC DMP REEL 2017" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>

text: I am off work Thurs / Fri so sorry if I go quiet for a few days!
